languages.text: "Каждая реликвия здесь была или обнаружена вашими предками в ходе упорных поисков, или добыта в бою у нечестивцев, или получена в дар за великие деяния. Красноречивая демонстрация верности Императору, не так ли?" {n}Проповедник говорит с нескрываемой гордостью.{/n} "Мы же содержим драгоценные святыни в порядке и покое, служа молебны и таинства. Особо старателен в заботе о реликвиях послушник Зик. Он из простого народа, но заслужил свое место прилежанием и богобоязненностью".

"Every relic we have here was either arduously tracked down by your ancestors, captured in battle against the faithless, or received as a gift for glorious deeds. A show of loyalty to the Emperor that speaks for itself, does it not?" {n}He makes no effort to conceal his pride.{/n} "For our part, we keep the precious relics intact and undisturbed as we conduct liturgies and perform rites. Initiate Ziek is especially diligent in his care for the relics. Though he is of common stock, he earned his position through dedication and piety."
languages.original_text: "Каждая реликвия здесь была или обнаружена вашими предками в ходе упорных поисков, или добыта в бою у нечестивцев, или получена в дар за великие деяния. Красноречивая демонстрация верности Императору, не так ли?" {n}Проповедник говорит с нескрываемой гордостью.{/n} "Мы же содержим драгоценные святыни в порядке и покое, служа молебны и таинства. Особо старателен в заботе о реликвиях послушник Зик. Он из простого народа, но заслужил свое место прилежанием и богобоязненностью".

traits.locale_text: "Every relic we have here was either found by your ancestors after an arduous search, captured in battle against the faithless, or received as a gift for glorious deeds. A show of loyalty to the Emperor that speaks for itself, does it not?" {n}The preacher makes no effort to conceal his pride.{/n} "For our part, we keep the precious relics intact and undisturbed as we conduct liturgies and perform rites. Acolyte Ziek is especially arduous in his care for the relics. Though he is of common stock, he earned his position with his diligence and piety."

A show of loyalty to the Emperor that speaks for itself, does it not?" {n}The preacher makes no effort to conceal his pride.{/n} "For our part, we keep the precious relics intact and undisturbed as we conduct liturgies and perform rites. Acolyte Ziek is especially arduous in his care for the relics. Though he is of common stock, he earned his position with his diligence and piety."

A show of loyalty to the Emperor that speaks for itself, does it not?" {n}The reverend makes no effort to conceal his pride.{/n} "For our part, we keep the precious relics intact and undisturbed as we conduct liturgies and perform rites. Acolyte Ziek is especially arduous in his care for the relics. Though he is of common stock, he earned his position through diligence and piety."

Initiate Ziek is especially diligent in his care for the relics. Though he is of common stock, he earned his position through dedication and piety."

Initiate Ziek is especially diligent in his care for the relics. Though he is of common stock, he earned his position through dedication and piety."

languages.text: « Toutes les reliques exposées ici ont été retrouvées à grand-peine par vos ancêtres, arrachées aux infidèles ou reçues en récompense de glorieux exploits. Une preuve de loyauté envers l'Empereur qui parle d'elle-même, n'est-ce pas ? {n}explique-t-il avec une fierté non dissimulée.{/n} Quant à nous, nous veillons à ce que rien ni personne ne nuise à ces précieux artefacts, tout en menant des liturgies et en réalisant des rites. L'initié Ziek est tout particulièrement diligent dans son travail. Bien qu'il soit issu du bas peuple, il s'est montré suffisamment dévoué et pieux pour mériter ce poste. »
languages.original_text: "Every relic we have here was either arduously tracked down by your ancestors, captured in battle against the faithless, or received as a gift for glorious deeds. A show of loyalty to the Emperor that speaks for itself, does it not?" {n}He makes no effort to conceal his pride.{/n} "For our part, we keep the precious relics intact and undisturbed as we conduct liturgies and perform rites. Initiate Ziek is especially diligent in his care for the relics. Though he is of common stock, he earned his position through dedication and piety."

traits.locale_text: « Toutes les reliques exposées ici ont été retrouvées à grand-peine par vos ancêtres, arrachées aux infidèles ou reçues en récompense de glorieux exploits. Une preuve de loyauté envers l'Empereur qui parle d'elle-même, n'est-ce pas ? {n}explique-t-il avec une fierté non dissimulée.{/n} Quant à nous, nous veillons à ce que rien ni personne ne nuise à ces précieux artefacts, tout en menant des liturgies et en réalisant des rites. L'initié Ziek est tout particulièrement diligent dans son travail. Bien qu'il soit issu du bas peuple, il s'est montré suffisamment dévoué et pieux pour mériter ce poste. »

languages.text: «Todas las reliquias que custodiamos aquí fueron obtenidas por sus antepasados tras una ardua búsqueda, arrebatadas a los infieles o recibidas como obsequio por alguna hazaña gloriosa. Una muestra de lealtad al Emperador que habla por sí sola, ¿no le parece?». {n}El clérigo no hace ningún esfuerzo por disimular su orgullo.{/n} «Por nuestra parte, velamos por la integridad de las santas reliquias mientras oficiamos liturgias y celebramos los ritos. El iniciado Ziek es especialmente diligente en el cuidado de las reliquias. Aunque es de baja cuna, se ha ganado el puesto a base de entrega y devoción».
languages.original_text: "Every relic we have here was either arduously tracked down by your ancestors, captured in battle against the faithless, or received as a gift for glorious deeds. A show of loyalty to the Emperor that speaks for itself, does it not?" {n}He makes no effort to conceal his pride.{/n} "For our part, we keep the precious relics intact and undisturbed as we conduct liturgies and perform rites. Initiate Ziek is especially diligent in his care for the relics. Though he is of common stock, he earned his position through dedication and piety."

traits.locale_text: «Todas las reliquias que custodiamos aquí fueron obtenidas por sus antepasados tras una ardua búsqueda, arrebatadas a los infieles o recibidas como obsequio por alguna hazaña gloriosa. Una muestra de lealtad al Emperador que habla por sí sola, ¿no le parece?». {n}El clérigo no hace ningún esfuerzo por disimular su orgullo.{/n} «Por nuestra parte, velamos por la integridad de las santas reliquias mientras oficiamos liturgias y celebramos los ritos. El iniciado Ziek es especialmente diligente en el cuidado de las reliquias. Aunque es de baja cuna, se ha ganado el puesto a base de entrega y devoción».

languages.text: “这里的每件圣物，要么是您的祖先与异教徒勇猛作战，用鲜血与汗水换来的，要么是实现了伟大的成就，从帝国处收到的礼物。这些圣物代表着对帝皇的忠诚，这一点不言自明，是吧？”{n}他毫不掩饰他的自豪之情。{/n}“至于我们，我们会负责进行礼拜，举行仪式，确保这些珍贵的圣物完好无损。助祭齐耶克在照顾圣物时极为用心，尽管他出身平凡，但他通过虔诚与奉献赢得了现在的地位。”
languages.original_text: "Every relic we have here was either arduously tracked down by your ancestors, captured in battle against the faithless, or received as a gift for glorious deeds. A show of loyalty to the Emperor that speaks for itself, does it not?" {n}He makes no effort to conceal his pride.{/n} "For our part, we keep the precious relics intact and undisturbed as we conduct liturgies and perform rites. Initiate Ziek is especially diligent in his care for the relics. Though he is of common stock, he earned his position through dedication and piety."

traits.locale_text: “这里的每件圣物，要么是您的祖先与异教徒勇猛作战，用鲜血与汗水换来的，要么是实现了伟大的成就，从帝国处收到的礼物。这些圣物代表着对帝皇的忠诚，这一点不言自明，是吧？”{n}他毫不掩饰他的自豪之情。{/n}“至于我们，我们会负责进行礼拜，举行仪式，确保这些珍贵的圣物完好无损。助祭齐耶克在照顾圣物时极为用心，尽管他出身平凡，但他通过虔诚与奉献赢得了现在的地位。”

languages.text: 「ここにあるすべての遺物は、あなた方の先祖が苦労して探し出したか、信仰を持たない者たちとの戦いで捕獲したか、あるいは輝かしい功績に対して贈られたものです。皇帝への忠誠を示すものです。そうでしょう？」{n} 彼は誇りを隠そうともしなかった。 {/n}「我々としては、典礼や儀式を執り行う際、貴重な聖遺物を無傷のまま乱すことなく保管しています。イニシエイトのジークは特に熱心に聖遺物を管理している。彼は一般的な家柄ですが、献身と敬虔さによってその地位を得たのです」
languages.original_text: "Every relic we have here was either arduously tracked down by your ancestors, captured in battle against the faithless, or received as a gift for glorious deeds. A show of loyalty to the Emperor that speaks for itself, does it not?" {n}He makes no effort to conceal his pride.{/n} "For our part, we keep the precious relics intact and undisturbed as we conduct liturgies and perform rites. Initiate Ziek is especially diligent in his care for the relics. Though he is of common stock, he earned his position through dedication and piety."

traits.locale_text: 「ここにあるすべての遺物は、あなた方の先祖が苦労して探し出したか、信仰を持たない者たちとの戦いで捕獲したか、あるいは輝かしい功績に対して贈られたものです。皇帝への忠誠を示すものです。そうでしょう？」{n} 彼は誇りを隠そうともしなかった。 {/n}「我々としては、典礼や儀式を執り行う際、貴重な聖遺物を無傷のまま乱すことなく保管しています。イニシエイトのジークは特に熱心に聖遺物を管理している。彼は一般的な家柄ですが、献身と敬虔さによってその地位を得たのです」

languages.text: "Jedes Relikt, das wir hier haben, wurde entweder mühsam von Euren Ahnen aufgespürt, im Kampf gegen die Ungläubigen gewonnen oder als Geschenk für glorreiche Taten erhalten. Ein Beweis der Loyalität dem Imperator gegenüber, der für sich selbst spricht, nicht wahr?" {n}Er gibt sich keine Mühe, seinen Stolz zu verbergen.{/n} "Wir für unseren Teil sorgen dafür, dass die wertvollen Relikte intakt und ungestört bleiben, halten Liturgien ab und führen Rituale aus. Der Eingeweihte Ziek kümmert sich besonders pflichtbewusst um die Relikte. Er stammt zwar aus niederem Hause, hat sich seine Position jedoch durch Hingabe und Frömmigkeit verdient."
languages.original_text: "Every relic we have here was either arduously tracked down by your ancestors, captured in battle against the faithless, or received as a gift for glorious deeds. A show of loyalty to the Emperor that speaks for itself, does it not?" {n}He makes no effort to conceal his pride.{/n} "For our part, we keep the precious relics intact and undisturbed as we conduct liturgies and perform rites. Initiate Ziek is especially diligent in his care for the relics. Though he is of common stock, he earned his position through dedication and piety."

Ein Beweis der Loyalität dem Imperator gegenüber, der für sich selbst spricht, nicht wahr?" {n}Er gibt sich keine Mühe, seinen Stolz zu verbergen.{/n} "Wir für unseren Teil sorgen dafür, dass die wertvollen Relikte intakt und ungestört bleiben, halten Liturgien ab und führen Rituale aus. Der Eingeweihte Ziek kümmert sich besonders pflichtbewusst um die Relikte. Er stammt zwar aus niederem Hause, hat sich seine Position jedoch durch Hingabe und Frömmigkeit verdient."

languages.text: "Burada sahip olduğumuz tüm yadigârlar ya izleri atalarınızın gayretleriyle sürülerek bulunmuştur ya inançsızlara karşı verilen muharebelerde ele geçirilmiştir ya da büyük başarılar sonrasında armağan olarak alınmıştır. İmparator'a olan sadakatin, sözlere lüzum bırakmayan bir sergisi, yanılıyor muyum?" {n}Gururunu gizleme gereği duymuyor.{/n} "Bizim üzerimize düşen, bu paha biçilmez yadigârları iyi durumda tutmak ve dualar okuyup ayinler gerçekleştirirken kimsenin onlara el sürmemesini sağlamak. Özellikle Zangoç Ziek bu yadigârlarla ilgilenmek konusunda büyük özen sergiliyor. Sıradan halktan geliyor olmasına rağmen adanmışlığı ve dindarlığıyla bulunduğu mevkiye kadar yükseldi."
languages.original_text: "Every relic we have here was either arduously tracked down by your ancestors, captured in battle against the faithless, or received as a gift for glorious deeds. A show of loyalty to the Emperor that speaks for itself, does it not?" {n}He makes no effort to conceal his pride.{/n} "For our part, we keep the precious relics intact and undisturbed as we conduct liturgies and perform rites. Initiate Ziek is especially diligent in his care for the relics. Though he is of common stock, he earned his position through dedication and piety."
